data.scheme_name: Bihar IT (Information Technology) Policy 2024 - Capital Investment Subsidy/ Interest Subvention - Female - All Categories - Existing
data.benefits:
• Scheme provides one time capital subsidy of 30% on Fixed Capital Investment (FCI) up to max. limit of Rs. 3000 lakhs or interest subvention of 10% or actual rate of interest, whichever is lower. 
  • Additional incentives of 5% to women owned enterprises.
data.eligibility: All existing IT/ITes/ESDM units are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. Employee Requirement: Minimum 60% of employees must be stationed in Bihar.
  2. Benefit Eligibility: Applicant can claim only one benefit between capital investment subsidy and interest subvention scheme.
  3. Incentive Period: Incentives applicable after commercial production and for a maximum period of 5 years.
  4. GST Registration: Units must have GST registration in Bihar.
  5. Reimbursement Process: Reimbursement will be done on submission of proof of payment made to authorities.
  6. Women Entrepreneur Criteria: Individual women entrepreneur must have minimum 51% shareholding and hold a director position in IT/ITeS/ESDM units.
  7. Minimum Investment Requirement: IT/ITeS/ESDM units must have a minimum fixed capital investment of Rs. 50 lakh.
data.beneficiaries: All existing IT/ITes/ESDM units are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. Employee Requirement: Minimum 60% of employees must be stationed in Bihar.
  2. Benefit Eligibility: Applicant can claim only one benefit between capital investment subsidy and interest subvention scheme.
  3. Incentive Period: Incentives applicable after commercial production and for a maximum period of 5 years.
  4. GST Registration: Units must have GST registration in Bihar.
  5. Reimbursement Process: Reimbursement will be done on submission of proof of payment made to authorities.
  6. Women Entrepreneur Criteria: Individual women entrepreneur must have minimum 51% shareholding and hold a director position in IT/ITeS/ESDM units.
  7. Minimum Investment Requirement: IT/ITeS/ESDM units must have a minimum fixed capital investment of Rs. 50 lakh.
data.context: Bihar IT Policy 2024 introduced to develop the IT/ ITeS and ESDM industry of the State for inclusive socio- economic growth and gainful employment generation, and to emerge as the next investment destination for IT/ ITeS companies in the country, while offering an enabling environment for industrial investments, stable policies and transparent governance.
data.objective: The main objective of this scheme is to build a strong eco-system for nurturing innovation in the State and empower them to grow across domains in the IT/ ITeS and ESDM sector.
data.description:
1. Scheme provides one-time capital subsidy of 30% on Fixed Capital Investment (FCI) up to a maximum limit of Rs. 3000 lakhs.
  2. Scheme provides interest subvention of 10% or actual rate of interest, whichever is lower.
  3. The overall limit of this subvention will be 50% of the approved project cost as approved by Bank/FI or Rs. 4000 lakh, whichever is lower.
  4. Additional incentives of 5% to women-owned enterprises.
  5. The applicant can apply for subsidy under only one of the above two routes: Capital Subsidy or Interest Subvention.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through http://investit.bihar.gov.in/InterestForm
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the subsidy in 5 equal annual installments post commercial production.
data.additional_info:
Fixed capital investment includes:

  • Land purchase
  • Building purchase/construction
  • Plant & Machinery
  • Stamp duty and land conversion fee, if paid

The cost of land shall be the lower of:

  • 20% of total proposed investment excluding land cost
  • Actual cost assessed by scheduled commercial bank/registered financial institutions

Additional 5% incentives for:

  • SC/ST/BC/EBC Women/Divyangjan/War widows/Acid attack survivors/Third gender entrepreneurs holding 51% shareholding and a Director or equivalent position

Additional 10% incentives for units established outside Patna and Danapur Municipal areas

Benefits under this policy cannot be combined with other state schemes for the same investment; dovetailing with central schemes is permitted.
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate
GST Registration Certificate
Sel-declaration by organization
Biometric records copy of attendence of employees
Copy of Payments
Project Report
Registered Lease Deed
Energy bill 
Applications
KYC Documents
Incorporation Certificate
Certificate from Labor department (Expansion)
Domicile certificate for employees from Bihar
CA Certificate for Fixed Capital Investment
Copy of Original bills/Invoice under FCI
Letter of Authorization
Proof of payment against respective FCI heads
Cancelled cheque of the bank account of the IT/ITeS/ESDM Entity 
Other documents as require
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: 2nd and 5th floor , Technology Bhawan, Bailey Road , Patna 800015 (Bihar)
Ph. No.: +91-612-2547315
Email ID: invest.it@bihar.gov.in
data.beneficiary: IT/ITeS Industry - Proprietorship, Partnership, Limited Liability Partnership, Private Limited Company, Public Company - Bihar - SMEs and Non-MSMEs
data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale - Up
